tools package¶

This package contains all the tools used on our data. Mainly the preprocessing and plotting

Submodules¶

tools.prepro module¶

tools.prepro.decode_audio(audio_binary)¶

Function for decoding the audio. Have to use tf_io_nighly to be able to decode our wav. This is due to the difference between wav_ext and wav_pcm

Parameters

audio_binary (A Tensor of type string.) – the binnary of the audio to decode

Returns

Decoded audio.

tools.prepro.get_label(file_path)¶

Get the label for the audio file -2 since it is to steps pu that the label apears

Parameters

file_path (str) – The filepath of the file to get the label for

tools.prepro.get_spectrogram(waveform)¶

Get the spectrogram for the waveform. Calculates the Short-time Fourier Transform using tf.signal.stft

Pram waveform

The decoded audio waveform

Returns

Tensor of float32

tools.prepro.get_spectrogram_and_label_id(audio, label)¶

Get both the spectogram and the label_id (0 or 1 for normal or abnormal).

Parameters

  • auido – The decoded audio

  • label – The label for the audio

tools.prepro.get_waveform_and_label(file_path)¶

Get the waveform and the label for the auido file ie. normal or abnormal

Parameters

file_path (str) – The path to the file to get the label and waveform for

Returns

tensorflow Data object

tools.prepro.plot_spectrogram(spectrogram, ax)¶

Plots the spectogram
